elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.  {H} []I gain 1 boost.
{H} If you control one or more Landmarks: Target Character switches Expeditions.  At Dusk — []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []Each Character controlled by target player gains [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Target Character gains 1 boost.  When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} Roll a die. On a 4+: Target Character gains 1 boost.  When I leave the Expedition zone — []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]].
